title: Pak man recovers from Coronavirus and throws a party for 100 people? It’s a satirical piece | Newsmobile
author: newsmobile.in
vclaim:
A post has been circulating on social media stating that a man in Pakistan threw a party consisting of 100 people after recovering from Coronavirus. It further states that after attending the party, multiple people present there were infected with the virus.

The news has also been circulated on WhatsApp.

We fact-checked the above claims and found that it is a satirical piece.

Since multiple people had sourced the information to thefauxy.com, we first checked their website and found the original article.

We also checked the website and found a disclaimer, that declared the website as India’s Finest, Fastest and Fictitious News Source.

This proves that the viral post holds NO truth.
